name: Sanjô (Unity Dev Test 1)
description:
CONTROLS

WASD to move
Left Click to fire a regular arrow (costs nothing)
Headshot to kill
X to craft a super arrow (costs 4 dust)
Z to craft a rolling bomb (costs 2 super arrows)
Q to fire a super arrow (must be crafted first)
SPACE to throw a rolling bomb (must be crafted first)

PREMISE

The Sanjô Palace is under attack by hordes of enemies from Kyôto. It is up to you, your archery skills, and your ability to instantly craft rockets and explosives out of dust to protect the Palace at all costs.

THINGS TO DO

Make sure to shoot enemies in the head to kill them. Shooting horsemen in the head will only knock them off their horse, so make sure to shoot them again once they're on the ground. Killing enemies awards points and leaves dust on the ground. Run over the dust to collect it for use in crafting powerful items. Score as many points as possible while defending Sanjô Palace.
